--- Rippersnapper ---

Rippersnapper shakes his head, his world is blurry. The first thing 
he sees is light, then he sees nothing and is confused (he blinked). 
He stands up, as his sight returns, and he spots Hun-Grr, 
"Rippersnapper show bots what like to be mad." He bounds 
towards Orion and Hun-Grr, firing two missiles at Orion, not 
worrying if Hun-Grr might get in the way.
